welcome_message_body: Welcome to Steamboat Springs, a charming mountain town known for its world-class skiing and picturesque views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Happy travels!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yampa Valley Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Yampa Valley Airport is available for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
